About Us

"Building Zimbabwe's future — one stone at a time."

Highrise Build Investments is a construction and property investment company rooted in Epworth, Harare — the land of the iconic Chiremba balancing rocks, where ancient granite formations speak of permanence, balance, and enduring strength.

We bring that same spirit to every project: precision engineering, premium materials, and unwavering commitment to quality. From residential builds to commercial developments, our work stands as a testament to Zimbabwe's craftsmanship.

With deep roots in our community and a forward-looking approach to property development, we are the trusted partner for those who build with ambition and invest with confidence.

50+ Projects Completed
10 Years Experience
100+ Satisfied Clients
5,000 m² Area Built

Our Services

Construction

Residential and commercial building solutions with quality workmanship and precision engineering.

Property Development

Modern and sustainable property investments built for long-term value and community growth.

Renovations

Transforming spaces with innovative renovation solutions that respect original character.

Consultancy

Professional guidance for construction and investment projects from concept to completion.

Building Investments

Strategic property investment opportunities with strong returns and active portfolio management.

Equipment Supply

Reliable supply of premium construction materials and equipment for every project scale.

Why Choose Us

We combine expertise, innovation, and reliability to deliver projects on time and within budget. Our commitment to quality and client satisfaction makes us the trusted partner for construction and investment across Zimbabwe.

Expert Team

Skilled professionals with years of industry experience across construction and property development.

On-Time Delivery

We respect deadlines and deliver projects within budget — every time, without compromise.

Quality Assurance

Uncompromising standards in every project — from foundation to finishing, quality is non-negotiable.

Client Focus

Your vision is at the heart of everything we do. We listen, plan, and build to your exact requirements.
